00234     namespace detail
00235     {
00236         // we need to specialize the create_default template (used in hold_any) 
00237         // to be able to create a truly default constructed job_service (empty 
00238         // facade)
00239         template<>
00240         struct create_default<saga::job::service>
00241         {
00242             static saga::job::service* call()
00243             {
00244                 return new saga::job::service(1);    // use dummy constructor
00245             }
00246             template <typename T_> static void call(T_* obj) 
00247             { 
00248                 new (obj) saga::job::service(1); 
00249             }
00250         };
00251     }
